text: deva visvasa kalavuni! numbala allahge margaye (yuda vædimata) giya vita (numbala muhuna dena satura visvasivantayaku da avisvasavantayaku da yanna soya bala) pæhædili kara ganivu. numbalata salam-santiya idiripat kala ayata numbala melova jivitaye sampat soyamin ‘numba deva visvasa vantayaku nove’ yæyi nopavasanu. allah abiyasa boho sampat æta. mita pera numbala da sitiye melesamaya. pasuva allah numbalata upakara kaleya. ebævin pæhædili kara ganu. niyata vasayenma allah numbala karana dæ pilibanda va abhignanavantaya
